romalrc.lyric:
[00:00.280]meom chun xi gan sok
[00:02.360]zam deun neo reul cha za ga
[00:05.170]a mu ri ma ga do
[00:06.930]gyeol guk neo ui gyeo tin geol
[00:09.600]gil go gin yeo haeng eul ggeun nae
[00:12.340]i zen do ra ga
[00:14.800]neo ra neun ji beu ro
[00:16.500]ji geum da xi
[00:17.970]
[00:39.330]a mu ri him ggeot da da do
[00:41.750]da xi yeol rin seo rap ga ta
[00:44.360]ha neul ro no pi nal rin neon
[00:46.120]za ggu nae ge doe do ra wa
[00:49.020]him deul ge sam kin i byeol do
[00:51.400]da geu dae ro in geol
[00:53.480]
[00:57.460]su eop xxi ddeo nan gil wi e seo
[00:59.940]nan neo reul bal gyeo na go
[01:02.390]bi u ryeo haet ddeon ma meun ddo
[01:04.620]i reo ke neo ro cha ol ra
[01:07.060]bal geo reu mui ggeu te
[01:09.140]neul ni ga bu di chyeo
[01:11.580]geu man
[01:14.160]geu man
[01:17.050]meom chun xi gan sok
[01:18.820]zam deun neo reul cha za ga
[01:21.240]a mu ri ma ga do
[01:23.640]gyeol guk neo ui gyeo tin geol
[01:25.700]gil go gin yeo haeng eul ggeun nae
[01:29.150]i zen do ra ga
[01:31.090]neo ra neun ji beu ro
[01:33.290]ji geum da xi
[01:34.860]
[01:55.400]zo yo i zam deun bang eul yeo reo
[01:57.730]gi eo geul ggeo nae deu reo
[02:00.070]bu seo jin xi gan wi e seo
[02:02.180]seon myeo i neo neun ddeo ol ra
[02:04.330]gil i reun mam so ge
[02:07.200]neol ga dun chae sa ra
[02:09.240]geu man
[02:11.670]geu man
[02:14.720]meom chun xi gan sok
[02:16.410]zam deun neo reul cha za ga
[02:19.080]a mu ri ma ga do
[02:21.120]gyeol guk neo ui gyeo tin geol
[02:23.670]gil go gin yeo haeng eul ggeun nae
[02:26.440]i zen do ra ga
[02:28.370]neo ra neun ji beu ro
[02:31.160]ji geum da xi
[02:32.360]
[02:34.720]se sang eul dwi ji beo
[02:36.860]cha zeu ryeo hae
[02:39.050]o jik neo ro wan gyeol doen
[02:41.190]i ya gi reul
[02:44.090]mo deun geol i reo do
[02:49.040]nan neo ha na myeon dwae
[03:03.580]bi qi da ggeo jin yeo gi
[03:05.260]na reul a na zwo
[03:12.140]nu neul ga meu myeon
[03:14.270]so ri eop xxi mil ryeo wa
[03:16.500]i ma eum geu wi ro
[03:18.990]neon ddo han gyeop ssa yeo ga
[03:21.510]nae gen geu nu gu do a nin
[03:24.490]ni ga pi ryo hae
[03:26.610]do ra wa nae gyeo te
[03:28.740]geu nal gga ji
[03:30.150]
[03:31.570]
